metadata.description: The location of the resources (Azure region)
The name to be given to the Azure Function App where the sample functions will reside.

metadata.artifactsBaseUrl: The base URL of the ARM Template's resources (child templates and supporting VM extension scripts). For Azure Marketplace gallery packages, this value is passed by the Azure portal.

metadata.description: The SAS token (including the leading '?') if artifactsBaseUrl represents an Azure Storage account. The SAS token should be setup to have at least read on the blob or read+list on the container.
